column5: I know the more popular ice fishing lakes and areas such as simcoe and scugog, quinte but i would also like to fish some places other than the popular ones.  I have a cottage in midland and have fished midland bay and penetang.  So ideally something close to the cottage or at least an hour drive would be nice.  I dont care what im catching just some diff scenery would be nice.  Im willing to trade location for location as i have a few tips and tricks i can share.  please pm.  thanks!!!!!!!!!!!
